title: eReflect 7 Speed Reading 2014 (Windows+Mac) + eReflect Confidenc
description:
eReflect 7 Speed Reading


About :eReflect 7 Speed Reading:

We created 7 Speed Reading Software because we saw first hand what a big difference faster reading can make to someone's life and career. No matter what position you are currently in, this information applies to you. You're going to learn how to read three times faster, comprehend more, and develop an almost photographic memory for everything you read.

You can easily triple your reading speed and increase your comprehension so you can:

Take control of  information overload  and no more feeling pressured under piles of papers, books, and manuscripts.
Be the smartest person at work and be totally on top of all the information and watch your colleagues struggle to keep up. Be the  star  of every meeting.
Fly through every web page, email message, and book - easily stay 'in the know'. Have all the latest knowledge, news, and information.
Prepare for exams in one third the time while boosting your score and no more long nights of study. Learn what you need quickly and easily and be confident when you walk into the exam.
Save time and lots of it and spend time with your family, loved ones, and friends instead of reading at a snail's pace.
Feel energized and inspired and allow your knowledge to feed your inspiration.
Be the guru and easily stay on top of any topic. Know more about your material than anyone else.
Be interesting and attractive and know interesting facts and be good at conversation.
Become the equivalent of  gold  in today's knowledge-economy and with your new fast reading skills, you'll quickly gain the knowledge and skills that are worth fortunes to big business.

Name:eReflect 7 Speed Reading
Version:2014
System:Windows/Mac
Additional Text Pack

How to install:

Step 1:Install the software for your system(Windows/Mac)

Step 2:Run the program.When it asks for serial give the serial: 8E24-B731-889C-6125-FFAB-5EEB-BE58-9FC9

Step3:Create an account

Step 4:click Home=>Import Text Pack=>Import all 3 given text pack one by on.

(The Text Pack For Windows version will ONLY work with windows and the Text Pack for Mac version will ONLY work with Mac)
